markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warpwobble Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2020)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Warpwobble poison causes hallucinations of space bending and stretching, leading to vertigo and an inability to discern a stable place to move.

 **Saving Throw** DC 26 Will; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** treat all squares as difficult terrain (1 round); **Stage 2** treat all squares as greater difficult terrain (1 round); **Stage 3** treat all squares as [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456) (DC 26), treating a critical success to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) as a success, and a success as a success but moving on greater difficult terrain (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Warpwobble Poison

Stage 2: treat all squares as greater difficult terrain (1 round)

Stage 3: treat all squares as [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456) (DC 26), treating a critical success to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) as a success, and a success as a success but moving on greater difficult terrain (1 round)
